com.sun.msv.verifier
Interface DocumentDeclaration

All Known Implementing Classes:
REDocumentDeclaration, XSREDocDecl
public interface DocumentDeclaration

Represents a kind of "constraint" over XML document. Usually, this is what people call a schema.

Call the createAcceptor() method to start validation.

Author:
Kohsuke KAWAGUCHI
See Also:
Acceptor

Method Summary
 Acceptor createAcceptor()
          creates a new Acceptor that will validate the document element.
 

Method Detail

createAcceptor

Acceptor createAcceptor()
creates a new Acceptor that will validate the document element. In RELAX, this concept is equivalent to <topLevel> In TREX, this concept is equivalent to <start>

Returns:
The implementation cannot return null. Apparently, it is impossible to fail in this early stage.
